camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.host.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.host
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.host.description: Hostname(s) cassandra server(s). Multiple hosts can be separated by comma. Example: localhost

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.port.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.port
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.port.description: Port number of cassandra server(s) Example: 9042

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.username.description: The username to use for accessing a secured Cassandra Cluster

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.password.description: The password to use for accessing a secured Cassandra Cluster

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStr.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStrategy
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.resultStr.description: The strategy to convert the result set of the query. Possible values are ALL, ONE, LIMIT_10, LIMIT_100...

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.consisten.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.consistencyLevel
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.consisten.description: Consistency level to use. The value can be one of ANY, ONE, TWO, THREE, QUORUM, ALL, LOCAL_QUORUM, EACH_QUORUM, SERIAL, LOCAL_SERIAL, LOCAL_ONE

camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query.name: camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query
camel.kamelet.cassandra-source.query.description: The query to execute against the Cassandra cluster table
